### Wastewater

Wastewater data come from two sources - the Metropolitan Council Environmental Services Division and [xxx]. 

Here is what we did

```{r}
metro_ww <- readRDS(file.path(here::here(), "_waste/data-raw/wastewater/metro_ww.RDS")) %>% 
  filter(year == 2021)


plot_ly(
  data = metro_ww,
  type = "histogram",
  nbinsx = 50,
  color = ~stringr::str_to_sentence(class),
  x = ~log(emissions_metric_tons_co2e),
  opacity = 0.6
) %>% 
  plotly_layout() %>% 
  layout(barmode = "overlay")

```
